name: O.P. Jindal Global University
description: O.P. Jindal Global University (JGU), founded in 2009 as a philanthropic initiative by Naveen Jindal, offers a multi-disciplinary, research-oriented education. With over 12,500 students, 1,200+ faculty, and 2,800+ staff, JGU maintains a 1:9 faculty-student ratio and recruits globally. JGU has been India's top private university for three years (QS World University Rankings 2023), ranked among the top 150 globally for universities under 50, and recognized in the top 500 for graduate employability.

enhanced_description: O.P. Jindal Global University (JGU), established in 2009 as a philanthropic initiative, delivers a multi-disciplinary, research-oriented education with a core focus on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency. Consistently recognized among India's top private universities by QS World University Rankings 2023, and globally for graduate employability (top 500), JGU functions as a provider of advanced learning solutions. It leverages a substantial full-time faculty (1200+), over 200 faculty and student exchange collaborations, and a student body representing 70+ countries to foster a dynamic environment for continuous learning and optimization. Its offerings, encompassing elements of course authoring and corporate LMS, emphasize a global perspective, interdisciplinary curriculum, and world-class infrastructure to prepare individuals and organizations for the evolving global landscape.
